title: How aviation sector helping flight against covid-19? - Quora

response.answer_text: They have been helping by some alliance by providing food and snacks to the poor people and they are the brave person during the crusial time by providing fearless transport facility when people are stuck at different part of country during beginning of this crisis even though people misunderstood them at that situation but the contribution that they did at that time is surplus because i was one of them at that time who stuck at some other part at that very moment
